title: Sampler, 1839
medium:
Medium: silk, mercerized cotton and wool embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, eyelet and four sided cross stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Short and wider rectangle with alphabet, signature and isolated motifs including Italian flag.  Mercerized cotton present in the sampler makes the embroidered date impossible.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1839.
1839. Medium: silk, mercerized cotton and wool embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, eyelet and four sided cross stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-16.
